title: WTB: Pretty T206s PSA 3-5- green background
author: 1952boyntoncollector

posts.post_title: WTB: Pretty T206s PSA 3-5- green background
posts.post_content:
I would like to hang in my office some T206s in my office in a frame that holds cards with holders.  I need about 20 or so cards.  Dont need any particular player but centering is key.   Looking to spend $30-$150 a card.  Some of the in action poses are cool and portraits too.  Maybe cool names work too.   Can buy raw too but costs of grading factor into the price.  Basically looking at cards like i used to look for my women, cheap and pretty

Just looking for a conversation piece..

looking for uniformity now...just green background   or  blue sky/green bottom...2 color backgrounds

no creases but back damage is fine if raw or lower than psa 3

[quote name="jimivintage" post=1461762]PM sent![/QUOTE]

thanks will take a close look...just a quick look ..guys like scoops carey and rube kroth have the nice multicolored background......

Jake, I recently finished a similar project for my office with 20 PSA graded cards. I had a local framing shop cut a custom mat, and the PSA slabs really worked well for the spacing. With a white or lighter color mat, the color of the cards really pop. Good luck!

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/19oYOj7.jpg[/IMG]

[quote name="vansaad" post=1461823]Jake, I recently finished a similar project for my office with 20 PSA graded cards. I had a local framing shop cut a custom mat, and the PSA slabs really worked well for the spacing. With a white or lighter color mat, the color of the cards really pop. Good luck!

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/19oYOj7.jpg[/IMG][/QUOTE]

cool and nice idea!!

[quote name="1952boyntoncollector" post=1462420]cool and nice idea!![/QUOTE]

This is so awesome. I would post this on Pinterest if I knew how to use Pinterest. Thinking a project like this with Goudeys in the near future.

I changed my interest a bit...going for uniformity.

looking for t206 no crease  psa 3-5  with green background  (cy young and ty cobb will be out of my range)


also may be doing the blue sky/green bottom  2 color backgrounds.....centering key...don't care about the players..


back damage fine
